title: I just made the enemy team dodge 5 times cause i locked in SORAKA TOP
body:
that was 5 lobbies that were dodged just because i locked in soraka top.

you would think they would learn to just van her after like 3 or 4 lobbies right? nope. 

at the 6th lobby it was finally my jgler who banned my soraka cause he said "srry top, that's enough i just wanna play already"

I wholly understood cause it was literally like a 20 minute wait so I just said "lol.k"
